text: Minden is a city in the German state of North Rhine-Westphalia. The name may also refer to: ==Place names== In Germany: *Minden, Rhineland-Palatinate *Minden, North Rhine-Westphalia In Australia: * Minden, Queensland In Canada: * Minden, Ontario In the United States: * Minden, Alabama * Minden, Iowa * Minden, Louisiana * Minden, Minnesota * Minden, Mississippi * Minden, Lawrence County, Missouri * Minden, Warren County, Missouri * Minden, Montana * Minden, Nebraska * Minden, Nevada * Minden, New York * Minden, South Carolina * Minden, Texas * Minden, West Virginia * Minden, Wisconsin * Mindenmines, Missouri * Minden City, Michigan * Minden Township, Pottawattamie County, Iowa, in Pottawattamie County, Iowa * Minden Township, Michigan * Minden Township, Benton County, Minnesota * New Minden, Illinois ==People== *Lion Van Minden (1880–1944), Dutch Olympic fencer ==Other uses== * SS Minden, German cargo ship, sank in 1939 * The М-1085 Minden, an ex-German minesweeper, now in service with the Georgian Navy * HMS Minden, Royal Navy ship, 1810 * Battle of Minden, 1759 * Minden Day (August 1), the commemoration of the Battle of Minden, is celebrated by the regiments of the British Army who fought in it
title: Minden (disambiguation)
